place.name: COLNEY
place.gazetteerText: COLNEY, a parish in Henstead district, Norfolk; on the river Yare, 3 miles W of Norwich. It has a post office under Norwich. Acres, 948. Real property, £2, 150. Pop., 84. Houses, 14. The property is divided among a few. Colney-Hall is a chief residence. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Norwich. Value, £199.* Patron, J. Scott, Esq. The church has a round tow r, and is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
